title: Nylon Noose (1963 Mystery film) Laya Raki, Richard Goodman, Helga Sommerfeld

sources.title: Nylon Noose (1963 Mystery film) Laya Raki, Richard Goodman, Helga Sommerfeld
sources.description:
Tangled secrets and twisted desires!
A company's stockholders hold their meeting at a spooky mansion, where a mad doctor is also conducting experiments in the mansion. Meanwhile bodies keep showing up with nylon noose strangulation marks as the cause of death... It leave you breathless!

Original Title: Die Nylonschlinge (1963)

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/Ru1PX5yMho0


Director: Rudolf Zehetgruber
Writers:  Fred Ignor, Thomas Engel
Stars: Richard Goodman, Helga Sommerfeld, Laya Raki, Ady Berber
Genres: German cinema, Crime, Drama, Mystery


00:00 Full Movie
